abstract: Release a car on a ramp so that it will stop precisely on a target. In this game of observation and calculation, get high scores and level up by finding patterns in the data of experimental trials. Start your InquirySpace experience here! Ramp Game is highly recommended as a prerequisite to all other InquirySpace activities, serving as an introduction to the CODAP (Common Online Data Analysis Platform) environment. This game scaffolds pattern recognition with the use of the powerful graphical analysis tools in CODAP. (InquirySpace Activity 1 of 7.)
name: Ramp Game (InquirySpace: 1)
